newsitem.title: USA: Zitel names chief of new services division.
newsitem.headline: Zitel names chief of new services division.

text.p: Zitel Corp said Thursday it appointed Arthur Chait as vice president and general manager of its solution services division.
Before his appointment, Chait was vice president at SRI International, formerly Stanford Research Institute.

The recently formed division will provide solutions to cope with computer problems with the advent of the year 2000 for corporate, commercial and government clients around the world, the company said.
Jack King, president and chief executive of the company, said the new division will help clients use a powerful technology developed by MatriDigm Corp to solve those problems.
MatriDigm's technology was developed with partial funding by Zitel, the company said.
Many computers in operation today are built to read dates up to the year 1999 and MatriDigm's technology is an approach to prevent any disruption with the coming of the year 2000.
